segments.text: Fine , thank you . How are you doing this morning ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not bad . How about you ? Haven't seen you for a long time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I've been to New York . I got back only yesterday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very much . New York is such a nice place . Shall I show you some photographs ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks , I like looking at photographs . How nice ! Oh , I'm afraid I must be going now . I've got an appointment . Have a good day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You too . I hope to see you soon . Goodbye .
segments.speaker: S2
